_sText:
Zm_forgotten_town is a town that got abandoned because of the zombie infection, the town has been re-opened. In the town there is 3 main buildings each contianing there own spots for camping/barricading and climbing, there is also a construction site. there are many places on the outside in which the humans can use to stay alive.
